cmp: 尺 (a Chinese foot (M)/one-third of a meter/a ruler/a note musical note on traditional Chinese scale)
mng: to use up, to exhaust, to end, to finish, to the utmost, exhausted, finished, to the limit (of sth), all, entirely
to the greatest extent, (when used before a noun of location) furthest or extreme, to be within the limits of, to give priority to

exm.mng: despite, although, even though, in spite of, unhesitatingly, do not hesitate (to ask, complain etc), (go ahead and do it) without hesitating
as quickly as possible, as soon as possible, with all speed, also written 盡快|尽快
as quickly as possible, as soon as possible, with all speed
as much as possible, to the greatest extent
as much as possible, to the greatest extent
to do one's duty, to do one's bit conscientiously
to have experienced a lot of, to have been through
